util

Class ThemeFinderImpl

  • Object
    • ThemeFinderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThemeFinder

    public class ThemeFinderImpl
extends Object
implements ThemeFinder
    Finds Theme XML's for MV-CoDA and deserialises them into Themes
    Author:
    tony

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<Path> returnDirectories(Path rootdir, String filetype, int numLevels)
      Walks a file tree to the specified number of levels returning all instances of the file extension specified it finds
      Theme returnTheme(String theme)
      Implementation for looking up themes from XML files.
      ArrayList<Theme> returnThemes()
      Walks the directory tree rooted at the root directory specified in Theme looking for .xml files representing Themes, deserialises and returns those it finds in an array of Themes Does not recurse further than root folders of themes i.e.: any lower than Theme\themefolder\*.xml is not considered valid

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • returnTheme

        public Theme returnTheme(String theme)
                  throws IOException
        Implementation for looking up themes from XML files. When passed the name of a theme will deserialise it and return it as a Theme
        Specified by:
        returnTheme in interface ThemeFinder
        Parameters:
        theme - the name of the Theme to return
        Returns:
        a Theme
        Throws:
        IOException - if the Theme cannot be accessed from the persistence store

      • returnThemes

        public ArrayList<Theme> returnThemes()
                              throws IOException
        Walks the directory tree rooted at the root directory specified in Theme looking for .xml files representing Themes, deserialises and returns those it finds in an array of Themes Does not recurse further than root folders of themes i.e.: any lower than Theme\themefolder\*.xml is not considered valid
        Specified by:
        returnThemes in interface ThemeFinder
        Returns:
        an array list of the paths to the found xml files
        Throws:
        IOException - if we can't acccess any xml files

      • returnDirectories

        public ArrayList<Path> returnDirectories(Path rootdir,
                                String filetype,
                                int numLevels)
                                  throws IOException
        Walks a file tree to the specified number of levels returning all instances of the file extension specified it finds
        Specified by:
        returnDirectories in interface ThemeFinder
        Parameters:
        rootdir - the directory relative to the classpath to be searched
        filetype - the filetype to search for - NOT including the dot
        numLevels - - the number of levels to recurse down the file tree
        Returns:
        arraylist of paths representing the found instances of files containing the filetype
        Throws:
        IOException - if the directory can't be accessed for the filetype
